nodes.description: 伊拉克议会选举后，前总理Iyad Allawi退出政府联盟，引发政治危机
nodes.support_text: one day before the attack former Iraqi Interim Prime Minister Iyad Allawi pulled out of coalition talks with Prime Minister Nuri al-Maliki

nodes.description: 美国开始从伊拉克减少驻军，驻军人数从60,000降至50,000
nodes.support_text: the United States began to reduce its troop strength in Iraq, from just under 60,000 at the time of this bombing, to about 50,000 by 31 August

nodes.description: 安全部队在爆炸前几个月成为恐怖袭击目标
nodes.support_text: Security forces have been targets of attack in the months prior to this bombing

nodes.description: 清晨自杀式袭击军队招募中心，造成60人死亡、100余人受伤
nodes.support_text: The first attack in the morning was when a suicide bomber detonated his explosives outside the Iraqi Army division headquarters... killed over 60 and wounded more than 100

nodes.description: 傍晚油罐车炸弹袭击什叶派社区，导致8人死亡、44人受伤
nodes.support_text: On the same day another attack occurred at 21:30 in the majority Shia neighbourhood of Hay Ur... killed eight people and wounding 44 more

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国宣称对第一起爆炸负责，并谴责什叶派和叛徒
nodes.support_text: Islamic State of Iraq... within three days claimed the first of the two attacks

nodes.description: 白宫回应称袭击阻碍民主进程，但相信局势可控
nodes.support_text: A White House spokesman said "There obviously are still people who want to derail the advances that the Iraqi people have made toward democracy..."

nodes.description: 伊拉克军方发言人谴责 AQI 发动袭击
nodes.support_text: 伊拉克军方发言人谴责 AQI 发动袭击

edges.support_text: one day before the attack former Iraqi Interim Prime Minister Iyad Allawi pulled out of coalition talks with Prime Minister Nuri al-Maliki
Security forces have been targets of attack in the months prior to this bombing
The first attack in the morning... The second attack took place in the evening
Islamic State of Iraq... within three days claimed the first of the two attacks
A White House spokesman said "There obviously are still people who want to derail the advances..."
the United States began to reduce its troop strength in Iraq, from just under 60,000 at the time of this bombing
谴责 AQI 发动袭击与伊斯兰国宣称对爆炸负责存在时序关联
检查站通过事件与美军撤军存在时间关联
